column6: DOOM PART 1 The origin of Doom is revealed! During that fateful day when the Fantastic Four came to be, Victor Van Damme was irreparably transformed into a hideous villain. Find out how! Also, see the Fantastic Four deal with their new powers!
column8: | writer:Warren Ellis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave Stewart
